inclusion.criterion: Histologically or cytologically proven diagnosis of epithelial ovarian cancer, primary peritoneal cancer or fallopian tube cancer, including all histological subtypes and carcinosarcoma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Progression-free interval between 4 to 9 months after first line chemotherapy or 4 to 12 months after second-line chemotherapy with a platinum (cisplatin or carboplatin) based regimen.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Non-epithelial ovarian cancer and ovarian tumours of low malignant potential (borderline tumours).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: More than two prior chemotherapy regimens for ovarian cancer (excluding hormonal therapy or biologic agents).
exclusion.label: triggers
